page.title: 11FANHAMS HALL,WARE.
page.content: {Fanhams Hall}is a{Queen Anne House,} builtand made bigger between 1412 and 1901.Anne Croft bought trees and flowers from Japan.In 1950 the Crofts sold it and now the Building Societies own it.They use it for balls and dinners.Anyone can hire it.Old stables have been changed to comfy bedrooms. Three peoplelive in Fanhams Hall and forty go to work there. The {Japanese Gardens}are beautiful all the year round.There aremany lovely trees and shrubs,two small lakes,a mound called Little Fujiyama and different stone lanterns. The Building Societies hope to sell Fanhams.We wonder what will happen to this interesting house with its special gardens.
